text: Peter Wong may refer to: * Peter Wong (banker) (born 1951), General Manager of HSBC Group and an executive director of Hong Kong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Limited * Peter Wong (sports commentator) (born 1944), Hong Kong- based host of a number of sporting programmes * Peter Wong (Australian politician) (born 1942), Australian politician, Unity Party member of the New South Wales Legislative Council * Peter Wong (Canadian politician) (1931–1998), Canadian municipal politician in Sudbury, Ontario * Peter C. Wong (1922–1989), member of the Executive Council and Legislative Council of Hong Kong * Peter Wong Hong-yuen (born 1944), member of the Legislative Council of Hong Kong (1988–95) * Peter Wong Man-kong (1949–2019), member of the National People's Congress from Hong Kong (1993–2019)
title: Peter Wong
